sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import {config} from "../config/config" import {getBasket, deleteFromBasket} from "../utils/basket" //Imports des composants de l'UI externes import Header from "./headers/header" import HeaderPages from "./headers/headerPages" import Footer from "./footer" //Imports depuis la librairie MaterialUI import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField' import InputAdornment from '@material-ui/core/InputAdornment'; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/styles" import { Button } from '@material-ui/core' import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete' const Basket = (props) => { const headerTitle = "Panier" const headerBreadcrumbs = [{value: "Accueil", link:"/"}, {value: "Boutique", link:"/shop"}, {value: "Panier", link:null}] const [basket, setBasket] = useState([]) let totalAmount = 0 //Définition des styles MaterialUI const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ qtyInput:{ flex:"1" }, addToBasket:{ marginTop: theme.spacing(2), width:"100%" }, deleteBtn:{ color:"#cc0e00" } })); const classes = useStyles(); //Au chargement de la page useEffect(() => { setBasket(getBasket()) },[]) const removeItemFromBasket = (id) => { deleteFromBasket(id) setBasket(getBasket()) } return(

Mon panier

{basket && basket.length + " produit(s)"}

{!basket &&

Votre panier est vide

} {basket &&
{basket.map((basketItem, index) => { let productAmount = (basketItem.quantity * basketItem.product.price/1000).toFixed(2) totalAmount += parseFloat(productAmount) return(

{basketItem.product.name}

{basketItem.product.category}

{basketItem.product.description.substring(0,70) + "..."}

{basketItem.product.price} €/Kg TTC

Quantité désirée : {basketItem.quantity} g

Prix total (TTC) : {productAmount} €

) })}
}

Total

Montant total (HT) :

{(totalAmount*0.8).toFixed(2)} €

Montant TVA :

{(totalAmount*0.2).toFixed(2)} €

Montant total (TTC) :

{totalAmount.toFixed(2)} €

) } export default Basket
